1�So you've made it this far,  .
1�Wait, don't tell me that I shouldn't be here.
1�I know my father forbade me from coming, but I can't just sit back and watch Eald'narche wreak havoc on our Vana'diel. I'm ready to fight to the finish!
1�When I first met you, you were just another little fish in a big pond of adventurers.
1�But now, look at you. You're putting your life on the line for the fate of all those on Vana'diel...
1�Even though no one will know you did.
1�You know...When this is all over, how about we hop on a ferry and sail around the world, ?[just the two of us?/just us two girls?]
1�Ha ha. ?[It doesn't look like you were ready for that. Well, just think about it, okay?/Well, just think about it, okay?]
1�I've got to go now.Don't forget what I said,  ...
1�You are the great bane--the nightmare that will devour the fair land of Vana'diel and thrust the world into fear and despair.
1�But as one bright star shines through the clouds at night...
1�And as one song rings clear above the roar of beasts...
1�We hold to one hope in these darkest of times.
1�The darkness must be vanquished.The bane must be purified.
1�No matter the consequences.
1�That they will come, with the wisdom of ages and the strength of thousands, to deliver us from our plight.
1�We await the awakening of the Warriors of the Crystal.

1�It is the heart of Tu'Lia.The Celestial Nexus, the key that opens the Gate of the Gods, lies within...
1�The path to the Celestial Nexus, with the shrine at its center, is guarded by the power of five beings born of the crystal.
1�Yes, the power of the crystal.Those five guardians hold the might of deities.
1�However, the potential to shatter those powerful beings has grown within the Children of Altana these past ten thousand years. I see that potential now in the person who doth stand before me.
1�Even so...The power of Eald'narche is incalculable. It far exceeds the might of even the Crystal Warriors.
1�I do not know if the strength I can lend thee will for certain aid in thy struggle against Eald'narche. It also entails great risk...

1�Thou must have in thy possession the five shards obtained from the Crystal Warriors, charged by the energies released in the clash of titanic forces. Shards broken from the warriors at the same time, in the same place.
1�The shards thou now possess are the five children of the crystal returned to their original form. From a living creature's perspective, it is a state close to death.
1�Left in this state, rather than regenerating, they will slowly lose their power and meet with true oblivion. Even now, the energy of the shards is evaporating.
1�Travel to Ro'Maeve when thou canst see the full moon in the night sky. The power of the ruins will awaken, filling the spring with water that will reflect the lunar sphere.

1�The Voidwatch is a fellowship of men and women come together to defend the world from extradimensional invaders called ??Voidwalkers.?? Driven only by an insatiable appetite for destruction, these fell horrors roam the space between dimensions, ever seeking to enter and plunge Vana'diel into chaos.

1�Faced with the risk of mass invasion, Voidwatch leaders devised a strategy wherein potential threats are preemptively neutralized.This act was made possible through the discovery of voidstones, magicked objects capable of rendering Voidwalkers visible to be summarily dispatched.
1�Such efforts to stem the rise of Voidwalkers, collectively dubbed ??Voidwatch Operations,?? or ??Ops?? for short, take place in the vicinity of planar rifts--weak points in the fabric of space.

1�A single person may initiate a Voidwatch operation, at which time ??Voidwatcher?? status will be bestowed upon all qualifying party and alliance members, allowing them to commence battle with the target Voidwalker.

1�Voidwatch Ops are subject to a time limit. Exceed this limit and Voidwatcher status will be revoked for all involved, bringing the confrontation to an end. Individuals straying too far from the site of battle, too, will find themselves relieved of the status.

1�Know also that those who take on the burden of the Voidwatcher become temporarily isolated and unable to receive aid from the outside world.Such is the arduous nature of transdimensional encounters.
1�Initiating a Voidwatch operation requires a voidstone, as well as a stratum abyssite attuned to a particular planar rift.
1�Only one person needs to be in possession of these objects for all party and alliance members to participate.
1�However, there exists a number of participation conditions that must be observed.

1�When an operation commences, a single voidstone will be expended for all who possess it.These combatants will have the opportunity to improve their spoils by manipulating spectral alignment values during battle.
1�Conversely, those not possessing their own voidstone will be limited in the spoils they can obtain.
1�The ??voidstone?? is a magicked object which, when coupled with stratum abyssite, is capable of rendering Voidwalkers visible.

1�Only a single combatant need possess a voidstone to allow all party and alliance members to participate in a Voidwatch operation.Those without one, however, will find their spoils limited in both quantity and quality.
1�As a single voidstone is automatically expended when the battle commences, it is recommended that you keep stock of your inventory.
1�Those wishing to obtain the stones should speak to a Voidwatch officer, who is charged with issuing a set quantity at fixed intervals.
1�Stratum abyssite are dynamic stones capable of evolution. By absorbing the energies emitted by felled Voidwalkers, they become attuned with other planar rifts.
1�After defeating your quarry, present your stone to an atmacite refiner--specialists in the study of otherworld geology--to have its properties determined.
1�Stratum abyssite growth occurs independently of voidstones, and the latter is not required to trigger development.

1�Each dimension is composed of its own existential spectrum to which objects of that world are aligned. The act of rendering a Voidwalker visible is essentially an act of aligning oneself to its existential spectrum.

1�Compensating measures, however, exist which allow combatants to more closely attune themselves with their extradimensional foe. One such method involves the use of alignment-enhancing artifacts known as ??ascent items.??

1�The Voidwatch is a fellowship of men and women come together to defend the world from extradimensional invaders called ??Voidwalkers.?? 1�Faced with the risk of mass invasion, Voidwatch leaders devised a strategy wherein potential threats are preemptively neutralized.This act was made possible through the discovery of voidstones, magicked objects capable of rendering Voidwalkers visible to be summarily dispatched.

1�Voidwatch Ops are subject to a time limit. Exceed this limit and Voidwatcher status will be revoked for all involved, bringing the confrontation to an end. Individuals straying too far from the site of battle, too, will find themselves relieved of the status.
